def prepare_job(self, bucket_name, document_name, document_bytes): """ Prepares a document image for an asynchronous detection job by uploading the image bytes to an Amazon S3 bucket. Amazon Textract must have permission to read from the bucket to process the image.
:param bucket_name: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket. :param document_name: The name of the image stored in Amazon S3. :param document_bytes: The image as byte data. """ try: bucket = self.s3_resource.Bucket(bucket_name) bucket.upload_fileobj(document_bytes, document_name) logger.info("Uploaded %s to %s.", document_name, bucket_name) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't upload %s to %s.", document_name, bucket_name) raise
